name: Pizza Shop Food Cash Register
description:
Get ready for amazing Pizza Shop Food Cash Register adventure, where kids are provided an amazing opportunity to make yummy pizza at beautifully designed pizza shop having exceptional restaurant mania. In this pizza making game, you can fulfill your dreams of becoming an exceptional cooking chef or highly professional master chef and making yummy pizza for your friends & family. In Pizza Shop Food Cash Register you can easily bake delicious or mouthwatering pizza while utilizing your exceptional food maker.


In Pizza Shop Food Cash Register you will play as master chef pizza maker or pro cooking chef of pizza shop having exceptional restaurant mania from pizza cooking game. Expertly bake yummy pizza or delicious Italian pizza having tasty delicious toppings & ingredients from pizza maker games to quickly enhance your food maker skills in a food truck.

Game Highlights:

- High-quality HD graphics & animations form baking games for making pizza ninja slice!
- High-quality intuitive controls for fulfilling of cooking fever!
- Collection of highly delicious toppings including Pepperoni or Mushrooms, Onions & more!
- Customize instructions for mixing & baking hot yummy pizza in the highly advanced oven!
- Perfect maker games based play mode!
